extras.tinactory.gui.networkController.title: Network Controller
extras.tinactory.gui.workbench.title: Workbench
extras.tinactory.jei.not_consumed: Does not get consumed in the process
extras.tinactory.chat.setTargetTech.success: Team %s set target tech to %s successfully.
extras.tinactory.technology.alloy_smelting.deta: A process that combines metals under high temperatures, producing specialized alloys with enhanced properties for advanced construction and manufacturing applications.
extras.tinactory.technology.steel.details: A versatile and durable construction material, essential for building strong structures and crafting advanced tools and equipment.
extras.tinactory.technology.motor.details: High-powered mechanical devices that drive machinery and vehicles, enabling dynamic movement and automation in various operations.
extras.tinactory.technology.pump_and_piston.det: Hydraulic systems designed to transfer fluids and generate force, crucial for powering heavy machinery and regulating industrial processes.
extras.tinactory.technology.electric_heating.de: A reliable heating solution that uses electricity to maintain optimal temperatures in industrial processes, ensuring consistent quality and energy efficiency.
extras.tinactory.technology.material_cutting.de: Precision technology for slicing and shaping raw materials into desired forms, enhancing manufacturing speed and allowing for complex designs.
extras.tinactory.technology.conveyor_module.det: An automated transport system designed to move resources efficiently between production lines, streamlining workflow and boosting productivity in your facilities.
extras.tinactory.technology.hot_working.details: A metal-forming technique that involves shaping materials at high temperatures, increasing their ductility and strength while allowing for complex designs and structural refinements.
extras.tinactory.technology.battery.details: A compact energy storage unit that provides a reliable power source for machinery, electronics, and backup systems, essential for maintaining continuous operation and energy efficiency.
A precision pairing where sensors detect environmental changes or objects, while emitters send out signals or energy, enabling automated control, tracking, and safety monitoring across complex systems.
A compact, multi-functional chip that combines numerous electronic components, streamlining processing power and control for advanced machinery and automation systems.
extras.tinactory.technology.robot_arm.details: A versatile, programmable mechanical arm designed for precise movements, ideal for tasks such as assembly, welding, and material handling in high-efficiency production lines.
extras.tinactory.technology.kanthal.details: A high-resistance metal alloy known for its durability and ability to withstand extreme temperatures, commonly used in heating elements and industrial furnaces for efficient, long-lasting performance.
extras.tinactory.technology.sifting.details: A filtration process that separates materials based on particle size, essential for refining raw resources and ensuring quality in production by isolating unwanted elements.
extras.tinactory.technology.autofarm.details: A fully automated agricultural system that plants, harvests, and processes crops with minimal human input, maximizing food production and resource efficiency across your settlement.
extras.tinactory.technology.chemistry.details: The scientific foundation for creating new materials and compounds, enabling advanced manufacturing, fuel production, and the development of powerful industrial processes.
extras.tinactory.technology.cleanroom.details: A controlled environment with minimal contaminants, essential for producing high-precision components like microchips and pharmaceuticals where even microscopic particles can compromise quality.
extras.tinactory.technology.cold_working.detail: A metal-forming process performed at room temperature, increasing material strength through deformation while maintaining precision and a smooth surface finish.
extras.tinactory.technology.cpu.details: The central processing unit that serves as the brain of automated systems, executing commands and managing complex operations with speed and precision.
extras.tinactory.technology.distillation.detail: A separation process that uses heat to isolate and purify liquids based on boiling points, essential for refining fuels, chemicals, and other valuable resources.
extras.tinactory.technology.electrolyzing.detai: A process that uses electric current to break down compounds into their elemental components, crucial for extracting pure materials like hydrogen, oxygen, and metals in advanced production chains.
extras.tinactory.technology.nichrome.details: A durable, high-resistance alloy commonly used in heating elements, valued for its ability to withstand high temperatures and maintain performance over prolonged use.
extras.tinactory.technology.oil_processing.deta: The refinement of crude oil into usable products like fuel, lubricants, and chemicals, forming a critical backbone for powering machinery and producing advanced materials.
extras.tinactory.technology.organic_chemistry.d: The study and manipulation of carbon-based compounds, enabling the creation of plastics, pharmaceuticals, fuels, and other essential materials in advanced manufacturing and research.
extras.tinactory.technology.pyrolyse_oven.detai: A high-temperature chamber that thermally decomposes organic materials in the absence of oxygen, used to recycle waste and produce valuable byproducts like creosote oil.
extras.tinactory.technology.soldering.details: A technique that joins metal components by melting a filler metal, creating strong electrical and mechanical connections essential for assembling electronic circuits and devices.
extras.tinactory.technology.vacuum_freezer.deta: A specialized cooling system that removes air to lower pressure, allowing materials to freeze quickly at lower temperatures and preserving delicate items without ice crystal formation.
Unlocks complex reactions that allow the synthesis of powerful compounds and rare materials. This technology is key to producing advanced fuels, polymers, and high-efficiency catalysts.
extras.tinactory.technology.arc_furnace.details: Uses high electrical currents to reach extreme temperatures, melting even the toughest ores and alloys. It drastically increases smelting speed and purity compared to traditional furnaces.
extras.tinactory.technology.autoclave.details: A high-pressure chamber that enables precise chemical and material processing. It’s essential for sterilization, advanced composites, and extracting resources otherwise locked away.
extras.tinactory.technology.digital_storage.det: Replaces bulky warehouses with compact, high-capacity memory banks. This allows for instant data access, organization, and control of large production networks.
extras.tinactory.technology.hydrometallurgy.det: Extracts metals using aqueous chemistry instead of heat, making recovery of rare elements more efficient. It’s particularly useful for reclaiming valuable materials from low-grade ores.
extras.tinactory.technology.lithography.details: Etches microscopic circuits onto silicon wafers to create advanced microchips. This breakthrough enables the leap into high-speed computing and automation.
extras.tinactory.technology.oil_cracking.detail: Breaks down heavy crude into lighter, more useful fuels and chemicals. This process unlocks plastics, synthetic materials, and efficient energy production.
extras.tinactory.technology.rocket_science.deta: Opens the path to space exploration with advanced propulsion and guidance systems. Mastering it is crucial for building rockets and satellites.
extras.tinactory.technology.rocket_t1.details: A basic spacecraft capable of reaching low orbit or nearby planetary bodies. It marks the first step toward interplanetary industry and colonization.
extras.tinactory.technology.tnt.details: A powerful explosive useful for mining, demolition, and warfare. Its destructive force makes it both a valuable tool and a dangerous weapon.
extras.tinactory.technology.surface_mount_devic: A breakthrough in electronics that allows components to be mounted directly onto circuit boards. This miniaturization leads to faster, more compact, and more reliable devices.
extras.tinactory.technology.tungsten_steel.deta: A super-hard alloy that resists heat and wear far better than ordinary steel. It’s indispensable for high-performance tools, armor, and cutting-edge machines.
extras.tinactory.technology.metal_former.detail: A precision machine that bends, presses, and shapes metals into complex parts. It enables mass production of durable components for advanced engineering.
extras.tinactory.technology.multi_smelter.detai: An industrial furnace capable of processing multiple ores simultaneously. Its efficiency saves time, energy, and space in large-scale metallurgical operations.
extras.tinactory.technology.advanced_polymer.de: High-strength synthetic materials designed for extreme durability and flexibility. They’re essential for advanced construction, protective gear, and high-performance machinery.
extras.tinactory.technology.carbon_fiber.detail: An ultra-light yet incredibly strong composite made from tightly bound carbon strands. It’s ideal for aerospace structures, advanced vehicles, and high-efficiency machinery where strength-to-weight ratio is critical.
extras.tinactory.technology.power_substation.de: A critical hub that distributes electricity from generators to factories and cities. It stabilizes voltage, prevents overloads, and ensures reliable energy flow across your entire network.
extras.tinactory.technology.rocket_t2.details: A powerful spacecraft equipped for interplanetary travel and heavier payloads. It expands exploration beyond nearby orbits, enabling resource transport and colony establishment on distant worlds.
extras.tinactory.technology.ender_chemistry.det: Harnesses the mysterious energies of the Ender dimension to manipulate matter in impossible ways. Its unstable reactions defy conventional science, unlocking materials and phenomena beyond the known universe.
extras.tinactory.technology.platinum_group_meta: A collection of rare, lustrous elements prized for their exceptional catalytic and conductive properties. They are vital for high-end electronics, advanced catalysts, and cutting-edge energy systems.
